ACM Student Chapter SP Jain School of Global Management

We, the ACM Student Chapter, are a vibrant community of tech enthusiasts united by a passion for innovation and exploration in the ever-evolving world of computing. For us, collaboration is more than just a principle—it’s the driving force behind our success. With a strong focus on skill development and knowledge sharing, we provide a platform for students to tackle real-world challenges, participate in groundbreaking projects, and connect with industry experts. Our mission is to cultivate an inclusive and dynamic environment that empowers aspiring innovators and future tech leaders to thrive.

Visit Us Today!

Our Mission

Bridging academia and industry, our platform serves as a hub for knowledge, collaboration, and innovation. By providing access to cutting-edge resources, hands-on projects, and industry interactions, we empower individuals to seamlessly blend theory with real-world application. Through teamwork, leadership, and ethical engagement, we cultivate well-rounded professionals who not only excel technically but also understand the broader impact of their work, fostering a more holistic approach to computing and technology.

Our Vision

Our vision is to create a dynamic and cooperative society where technology-interested people can come together to innovate in technology, enhance their skills, and foster innovation. Through the assistance of effective workshops, hands-on projects, and cooperative knowledge-share sessions, we aim to create a platform that fosters imagination, critical thinking, and technical expertise. By instilling a culture of continuous learning and cooperation, we empower our members to remain ahead of the ever-evolving technology environment and be capable of making meaningful contributions to the field.
